before.name: geo_tags
before.comment: Stores information about geographical coordinates in articles

columns.name: gt_id
columns.comment: Tag id, needed for selective replacement and paging

columns.name: gt_page_id
columns.comment: page_id

columns.name: gt_globe
columns.comment: Name of planet or other astronomic body on which the coordinates reside

columns.name: gt_primary
columns.comment: Whether this coordinate is primary (defines the principal location of article subject) or secondary (just mentioned in text)

columns.name: gt_lat_int
columns.comment: Latitude in fractional parts of degree (by default 1/10th)

columns.name: gt_lon_int
columns.comment: Longitude in fractional parts of degree (by default 1/10th)

columns.name: gt_lat
columns.comment: Latitude of the point in degrees

columns.name: gt_lon
columns.comment: Longitude of the point in degrees

columns.name: gt_dim
columns.comment: Approximate viewing radius in meters, gives an idea how large the object is

columns.name: gt_type
columns.comment: Type of the point

columns.name: gt_name
columns.comment: Point name on the map

columns.name: gt_country
columns.comment: Two character ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code

columns.name: gt_region
columns.comment: Second part of ISO 3166-2 region code, up to 3 alphanumeric chars
